tasks.task_description: Build Docker image with all integrated pages

description: Rebuild and deploy complete NPHIES-AI application with all integrated pages
context: Built Docker image successfully with all integrated pages
Successfully pushed Docker image to ECR repository
Created new ECS task definition revision 3 with updated image
Successfully updated ECS service with new task definition revision 3 - deployment in progress

Successfully rebuilt and deployed NPHIES-AI application. Most pages are working (7/10 returning 200), but some newer routes (ai-assistant, claims, settings) are still returning 404 due to deployment using older task definition. The application is running on free tier AWS with working pages: login, dashboard, nphies, profile, eligibility, pre-authorization, notifications.
